title: AI Project Canvas
description: Assistance in creating a project about AI through UI blocks.
summary: The AI Project Canvas helps users create a project about AI by breaking down the task into manageable steps. It includes a checklist for project creation with items like defining scope and identifying team members, as well as resource cards suggesting tools like Trello for project management and platforms like TensorFlow for AI development. By following the canvas, users can effectively plan and execute their AI projects.
